H0.text: Who beat Tim Henman in his first Wimbledon singles semifinal. Boris Becker

H1.text: Who beat Tim Henman in his first Wimbledon singles semifinal. Andre Agassi

H2.text: Who beat Tim Henman in his first Wimbledon singles semifinal. Patrick Rafter

H3.text: Who beat Tim Henman in his first Wimbledon singles semifinal. Sampras

A4.text: Henman reached the semi-finals at Wimbledon in 2002, losing to Lleyton Hewitt.
